If you're more adventurous, consider more concentration into specific fields - like REITs, which you can do locally, and Tech Funds (ideally aiming for 11% and upwards).It still does depend on your profile, so consider talking to an FA like myself for guidance before making a decision. https://www.facebook.com/luke.ho.54 I'd say that you're in a very good position to FIRE. 0 comments0
